translation.en: ♪ Oh-oh-oh-oh Oh-oh-oh-oh ♪

translation.en: Thank you for coming. WOMAN: Of course.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你能来
-不客气

translation.en: Good morning, Ella. You're like Horowitz with a needle and thread.
translation.zh:
早上好 艾拉
你就像手持针线的霍罗威茨

translation.en: Hi, Max.
translation.zh: 你好 麦克斯

translation.en: You mean the piano player? Best there ever was.
translation.zh:
-你指的是那个钢琴家？
-史上最伟大的钢琴家

translation.en: Fashion Week is only five weeks away

translation.en: and we've still got gaps in our collection.

translation.en: What about the trench-dress and the metallic blazer?

translation.en: Done and nearly done.

translation.en: Who did this?

translation.en: Um... I did.
translation.zh: 是我

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Ella Richards. I'm a sewer.

裙子后的开口缝不好
我只能把褶皱分在两边

translation.en: I like it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: You do.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Who are you wearing?
translation.zh: 你穿的是什么？

translation.en: I'm wearing me.
translation.zh: 是我的风格

translation.en: You're a designer?
translation.zh: 你是个设计师？

translation.en: A really good one.
translation.zh: 很有才华的设计师

translation.en: Yes, I can see that.
translation.zh: 是的 我看出来了

translation.en: That means a lot coming from you.

translation.en: MAX: I met Ella on the job.
translation.zh: 我和艾拉在工作中相识

translation.en: I went to her loft and saw her work and I was knocked out.
translation.zh:
我去了她的公寓 看到了她的作品
让我惊艳不已

translation.en: Hm. Max gave me the same stamp of approval when I was starting out.
translation.zh:
我初出茅庐时
麦克斯也给予了我同样的认可

translation.en: He was certainly right about you.
translation.zh:
我初出茅庐时
麦克斯也给予了我同样的认可 他绝对没看错你

translation.en: I've never known him to be wrong.
translation.zh: 他从来不会看错人

translation.en: If Max says you're good, believe him.
translation.zh: 如果麦克斯说你有才华 你要相信他

translation.en: Meeting Annie Chew was so inspiring, all I want to do is work.

遇见周安妮让我大受鼓舞
我现在一心只想工作

translation.en: That's all you ever do anyway. I really needed a boost right now.

-你一向都是个工作狂
-我现在急需一针强心剂

translation.en: Every time I talk to my mom or my brother,
translation.zh: 每次我跟我妈妈或弟弟聊天时

translation.en: I try to convince them that my designer dream is going strong,
translation.zh:
我试图说服他们
我的设计师梦想正在步入正轨

translation.en: and they always pretend to believe me.
translation.zh: 他们总是假装相信我

translation.en: Before you tumble down the rabbit hole of doubt,
translation.zh: 在你跌落自我怀疑的无底洞之前

translation.en: you want some left-over Chinese?

translation.en: Maybe later.
translation.zh: 待会儿吧

translation.en: Oh, how much Candice Huffine can one wall take?
translation.zh: 一面墙上能贴上多少坎迪斯赫芬？

translation.en: Well, I need all the inspiration I can get.
translation.zh: 我需要所有能启发灵感的东西

translation.en: Is your schedule free for the next few days?
translation.zh: 你接下来几天有空吗？

translation.en: I'm waiting to hear about a new sewing gig, but it might be.
translation.zh:
你接下来几天有空吗？ 我在等一个新的制衣工作
但是可能有空

translation.en: There's a really big photo shoot coming up at work
translation.zh: 我有一项重要的摄影工作

translation.en: and I could use an extra set of hands in the fitting room.
translation.zh: 我真的很需要帮手

translation.en: Claudia is pulling out all the stops and driving everybody nuts.
translation.zh:
克劳迪娅使出浑身解数
把每个人都逼疯了

translation.en: Yeah, well, she's a perfectionist. Most legends are.
translation.zh:
她是个完美主义者
大多数传奇人物都如此

translation.en: If by "perfectionist" you mean treating everybody at the magazine with the same
translation.zh:
如果说“完美主义者”
你指的是对杂志社的所有人

translation.en: disdain as gum stuck to the sole of her Louboutin pumps.
translation.zh:
都像对粘在她鲁布托高跟鞋底上的
口香糖一样不屑一顾

translation.en: You certainly have a way with words.
translation.zh: 你说话真有一套

translation.en: If only I could get someone to read them.
translation.zh: 如果能有读者欣赏我的文采就好了

translation.en: I'm working on this piece about the elegant chaos of Fashion Week.
translation.zh:
我在写一篇文章
解密时装周幕后优雅的混乱

translation.en: "Celebrities line the runway as designers have heart attacks
translation.zh:
“T台前明星云集的同时
后台的设计师们因为模特没跟上节奏

translation.en: back stage when a model misses a cue."
translation.zh: 而犯了心脏病”

translation.en: So, are those nimble fingers available?
translation.zh: 你这双灵巧的手有档期吗？

translation.en: You'd be doing me a really big favor. Okay. I'm in.
translation.zh:
-你真的能帮我解燃眉之急
-好吧 我来帮你

translation.en: I mean, I don't know about you, but I had a great time last night,
translation.zh:
我不知道你有何感觉
但是我玩得很开心

translation.en: Yeah, who knew you could cook like that?
translation.zh: 谁能想到你有这等厨艺？

translation.en: That's almond milk, right?
translation.zh:
-那是杏仁奶吧？
-你说的是豆浆

translation.en: I thought you said soy.
translation.zh:
-那是杏仁奶吧？
-你说的是豆浆 等一下 有另一个电话打进来了

translation.en: You know, hold on one second, I'm getting another call.
translation.zh: 等一下 有另一个电话打进来了

translation.en: Hey, when did you get back into town?
translation.zh: 嘿 你什么时候回来的？

translation.en: I did, I tried calling you. You need to tell her what you want.
translation.zh:
-我打了 我试着联系你了
-嘿 你要告诉她你要喝什么

translation.en: I'm just-- Hold on one second.
translation.zh: 我…等一下

translation.en: Uh... I'm sorry, what did you say?
translation.zh:
-对不起 你说什么？
-她在等你呢

translation.en: - She's waiting. - Who's waiting?
translation.zh:
-对不起 你说什么？
-她在等你呢 -谁在等？
-她

translation.en: She is.
translation.zh:
-谁在等？
-她

translation.en: All of us are.
translation.zh: 我们都在等你

translation.en: Oh, right. Sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 没错 对不起

translation.en: Um... Almond milk, please. Coming right up.
translation.zh:
-杏仁奶 谢谢
-马上来

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, no. You know what? Saturday night works for me.
translation.zh: 没错 你知道吗？周六晚上我可以

translation.en: Unbelievable.

translation.en: Okay. I'm-- I'm going to call you back.
translation.zh: 好吧 我回头再联系你

translation.en: Is something wrong?
translation.zh: 有什么问题吗？

translation.en: Oh, no. It's just that some of us have places to be, that's all.
translation.zh:
哦 没什么
只是我们这些人也在赶时间 没别的

translation.en: Right. Well, some of us would like to get what we ordered.
translation.zh: 没错 有些人只想喝自己点的饮品

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I've just never heard three syllables sound so judgmental.
translation.zh:
我从来没听过
这么充满评判色彩的三个音节

translation.en: Well-- That's for you.
translation.zh:
-你…
-这是给你的

translation.en: Have a wonderful day. Have a wonderful day.
translation.zh: 祝你愉快 祝你愉快

translation.en: Sounds good. Bye.

translation.en: I was about to ask you the same thing.
translation.zh: 我还想问你同样的问题呢

-所以你没在跟踪我
-别自作多情了

translation.en: So, are you always this friendly?

translation.en: Only with strangers I can't seem to shake.

-我不是陌生人

translation.en: Seriously? I guess so.

-不会这么巧吧？
-恐怕是的

translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.zh:
-你在杂志社工作？

-你在杂志社工作？
-我刚开始 你呢？ 我的室友在那里上班
我只是帮忙几天

translation.en: I guess this is us.
translation.zh: 我们的电梯到了

translation.en: There is no us.
translation.zh: 没有什么“我们”

translation.en: Do you think this was fate?

translation.en: Whatever it was, I'm afraid it's over, I'm late.

translation.en: I'm a little nervous.

translation.en: Word to the wise, stay out of Claudia Davenport's way,

给你一条忠告
别招惹克劳迪娅达文波特

translation.en: I hear she can be a real tyrant.
translation.zh:
-我听说她是个真正的暴君
-记住了

translation.en: - Noted. - Good luck.
translation.zh:
-我听说她是个真正的暴君
-记住了 -祝你好运
-谢谢你

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh:
-祝你好运
-谢谢你

translation.zh:
克劳迪娅预约了
翁贝托德卢卡负责拍摄

translation.en: and she's gone from overbearing to full-on diva.
translation.zh:
她从以前的霸道
变成了现在的专横苛刻

translation.en: When I think of the fashion icons that have walked these halls.
translation.zh: 来过这里的时尚大咖很多吧

translation.en: Right? Speaking of icons,
translation.zh: 没错 说到大咖

translation.en: keep your eyes forward and your mouth shut.

translation.zh:
-看看她穿的西装

translation.en: The woman does not disappoint.

translation.en: There's Liza, my impossible boss.

-你从没说过她有多漂亮
-如果你能忍受她的性格

-你为什么不在衣橱里？
-我正准备过去

translation.en: I feel like Dorothy entering Oz.

translation.en: Gucci. I mean.

translation.en: It's like I died and went to designer heaven.

translation.en: On your 87th visit the magic wears a little thin.

如果这是你第87次进来
你就不会感觉那么激动了

translation.en: Armani?

translation.en: It's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 好美呀

translation.en: - Can I try it on? - No.
translation.zh:
-我能试试吗？
-不行

translation.en: - Come on. Please? - No.
translation.zh:
-拜托 求你了？
-不行

translation.en: How you doing?

translation.en: Our subs are down. We're losing advertisers.

我们的订阅量减少了
广告商也纷纷撤单了

translation.en: Hey, I get I. These are hard times for all print media.
translation.zh:
嘿 我知道
所有的平面媒体都面临困境

translation.en: As the newly-installed man in charge, what do you propose we do?
translation.zh: 作为新任掌门人 你有什么建议？

translation.en: Well, I hate to say it, Claudia,

translation.en: but the magazine, it's-- it's outdated.
translation.zh: 但是杂志已经过时了

translation.en: The remaining subscribers, they don't relate to the content.
translation.zh: 仅存的订阅者不能对内容产生共情

translation.en: I'm not saying it's your fault. It's just the way it is.

translation.en: Your father is here. Perfect, send him in.
translation.zh:
-你的父亲来了
-很好 让他进来

translation.en: You needed back-up in dealing with your difficult Editor-in-Chief?

translation.en: [SCOFFING] I thought you go back a long way.
translation.zh: 我想你们是老相识了

translation.en: It might be reassuring.

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Always a pleasure, Roger.
translation.zh: 见到你总是很高兴 罗杰

translation.en: The pleasure is mine. Father.
translation.zh:
-我也很荣幸
-父亲

translation.en: Let me try to calm the predictable tension between you.
translation.zh: 让我试试缓和你们之间可预见的矛盾

translation.en: As Editor of The Look,
translation.zh: 作为《外表》的主编

translation.en: Claudia is one of our most valuable assets.
translation.zh: 克劳迪娅是我们最有价值的资产之一

translation.en: She's naturally very protective of the content.
translation.zh: 她自然想保护杂志的内容

translation.en: As the publisher, Derek's job is to make sure
translation.zh:
她自然想保护杂志的内容 作为出版商
德里克的工作是确保杂志盈利

translation.en: the magazine's profitable.
translation.zh:
作为出版商
德里克的工作是确保杂志盈利

translation.en: He bailed out two of our other publications
translation.zh: 通过增加线上曝光率

translation.en: by amping up their digital presence.
translation.zh: 他拯救了我们的另外两个出版物

translation.en: Does that mean you'll leave the print magazine alone?
translation.zh: 就是说你不会插手印刷杂志？

translation.en: Initially, yes, but the research and results
translation.zh: 最初的想法 没错 但是电子杂志的研究和结果

translation.en: from the digital magazine will be applied to the print
translation.zh: 但是电子杂志的研究和结果 会逐渐应用在印刷杂志上

translation.en: as we move forward.
translation.zh: 会逐渐应用在印刷杂志上

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 明白了

translation.en: I leave it to you and Derek to work out your differences,
translation.zh: 你和德里克自己解决分歧吧

translation.en: but you need to know, he speaks for me.
translation.zh: 你和德里克自己解决分歧吧 但是你要知道 他代表我的意见

translation.en: And I will continue to speak for me
translation.zh: 而我将继续代表我自己

translation.en: and the magazine that I helped to build.
translation.zh: 还有我帮助创办的杂志

translation.en: Good day, fellas.
translation.zh:
-祝你们愉快 同伴们
-克劳迪娅

translation.en: - Claudia. - Liza!
translation.zh:
-祝你们愉快 同伴们
-克劳迪娅 莱莎？

translation.en: This is harder than it looks.
translation.zh: 这可没有看上去那么简单

translation.en: Heaven forbid a Prada belt ends up in the same shot
translation.zh:
普拉达的腰带
千万不要和阿玛尼的西装裤

translation.en: as an Armani pantsuit.
translation.zh: 出现在同一拍摄镜头里

translation.en: I want your problems.
translation.zh: 出现在同一拍摄镜头里 我想要这种麻烦 我当实习生的时候

translation.en: When I started as a temp, I was so excited to have a job
translation.zh: 我当实习生的时候 特别期待找到时尚圈的工作

translation.en: in the fashion industry.
translation.zh: 特别期待找到时尚圈的工作

translation.en: I just didn't think I would still be in the same closet two years later.
translation.zh: 没想到两年之后我还在同一间衣橱里

translation.en: It's a pretty nice closet.
translation.zh: 没想到两年之后我还在同一间衣橱里 这间衣橱很棒

translation.en: Not for the fashion editor I've always wanted to be.
translation.zh:
对于我向往的时尚编辑一职
这里可不理想

translation.en: All these gorgeous dresses
translation.zh: 这么多美丽的裙子

translation.en: and none of them would fit a girl my size.
translation.zh: 没有一件适合我这种身材的女孩

translation.en: Hey, Claudia cannot count past four.
translation.zh: 嘿 克劳迪娅的尺码里最多只到四

translation.en: Seriously, let's go check out the shoes,
translation.zh: 说真的 我们去看看鞋子吧

translation.en: they come in all sizes.
translation.zh: 尺码齐全

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Oh, wow! Can I touch?
translation.zh:
-我能摸摸吗？
-不能

translation.en: Sure!
translation.zh:
-用眼睛呢？
-可以

translation.en: I wanted you to see The Closet
translation.zh: 我想带你参观一下衣橱

translation.en: and get an idea of how the magazine and the fashion world intersect.
translation.zh:
让你了解杂志和时尚界
是如何产生交集的

translation.en: I work very closely with all the designers.
translation.zh: 我和所有的设计师都合作密切 因为这间衣橱里搭配的造型

translation.en: Careers have been made because of the looks
translation.zh: 因为这间衣橱里搭配的造型

translation.en: put together in this room.
translation.zh: 我才创造了辉煌的职业生涯

translation.en: Yes, very impressive.
translation.zh: 嗯 叹为观止

translation.en: Things get really crazy around here as we gear up for Fashion Week.
translation.zh:
在为时装周备战期间
这里会乱作一团

translation.en: Who is that guy talking to Claudia? [GASPING] That's Derek Colby.
translation.zh:
-跟克劳迪娅说话的人是谁？
-那是德里克科尔比

translation.en: Colby Publishing.
translation.zh: 科尔比出版社 罗杰科尔比的儿子

translation.en: Roger Colby's son, they own a ton of magazines,
translation.zh: 科尔比出版社 罗杰科尔比的儿子 他们旗下拥有众多杂志 包括这一家

translation.en: including this one.
translation.zh: 他们旗下拥有众多杂志 包括这一家

translation.en: The Look is losing money so they sent
translation.zh: 《外表》在亏损

translation.en: the Prince of Publishing to help revive it.
translation.zh:
所以他们派来了出版业的王子
来使它起死回生

translation.en: That's what they call him. Who calls him that?
translation.zh:
-他们是这么称呼他的
-谁这么叫他？

translation.en: People, the press, he's a hot topic.
translation.zh:
所有人 媒体 他是个热门人物
一家交友网站发起了投票

translation.en: A dating site took a poll. He was voted the 7th most
translation.zh:
所有人 媒体 他是个热门人物
一家交友网站发起了投票 他被选为
纽约钻石王老五名单的第七名

translation.en: eligible bachelor in New York.
translation.zh:
他被选为
纽约钻石王老五名单的第七名

translation.en: LIZA: Katie, where are you?
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Great, I'll need you to take everything that you pulled
translation.zh:
很好
把你拿出来的衣服都送到试衣间

translation.en: to the fitting room.
translation.zh:
很好
把你拿出来的衣服都送到试衣间 克劳迪娅想看看模特穿上身的效果

translation.en: Claudia will want to see it on the models.

translation.en: So, we'll see you in the fitting room
translation.zh: 试衣间见吧

translation.en: and we will show you how we prepare for an editorial shoot.
translation.zh: 让你看看我们如何准备杂志拍摄

translation.en: [PHONE BUZZING] Can't wait.
translation.zh: 我很期待

translation.en: We are so happy to have you here.
translation.zh: 你能来我们真是荣幸之至

translation.en: Yup.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: It's you.
translation.zh: 是你

translation.en: Are you hiding?
translation.zh: 你在躲我吗？

translation.en: You're hiding.
translation.zh: 你在躲我

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Uh, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: We met at a coffee shop this morning.
translation.zh:
我们今早在咖啡馆见过 对 我们很有渊源
我却不知道你的名字

translation.en: Yes, we have all this history and I don't even know your name.
translation.zh:
对 我们很有渊源
我却不知道你的名字

translation.en: Ella Richards, and I'm Katie, by the way.
translation.zh: 艾拉理查兹 对了 我叫凯蒂

translation.en: Oh, it's, uh, very nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Why didn't you say who you were?
translation.zh: 你之前为什么不告诉我你是谁？

translation.en: And what was that about being new and nervous?
translation.zh: 为什么说你是新来的 还很紧张？

translation.en: Well, I am new and I am nervous.
translation.zh: 我是新来的 我也很紧张

translation.en: I have to make this company solvent.
translation.zh:
我必须帮助公司具备偿付能力 你知道
很多人听到我的名字就会紧张

translation.en: You see, most people are intimidated by my name
translation.zh:
你知道
很多人听到我的名字就会紧张

translation.en: and, well, I was enjoying your honesty.
translation.zh: 我很欣赏你的坦诚

translation.en: Why would I be intimidated?
translation.zh: 我为什么要紧张？

translation.en: I don't work here, and I am just helping.
translation.zh: 我不是这里的员工 我只是来帮忙的

translation.en: [CLEARING THROAT] Sorry. I have to-- I have to go.
translation.zh: 对不起 我得走了

translation.en: I think I can handle it.
translation.zh: 我想我应该没问题

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Okay, he may not be your boss, but he is mine,
translation.zh:
好了 他可能不是你的老板 但是他是我的老板
我老板的老板和她的老板

translation.en: and my boss's boss and her boss,
translation.zh:
但是他是我的老板
我老板的老板和她的老板

translation.en: try to resist the urge to offend him.
translation.zh: 请克制你顶撞他的冲动

translation.en: Okay, sure, he's just so entitled.
translation.zh: 好吧 他就是这么自以为是

translation.en: And so attractive. I hadn't noticed.
translation.zh:
-还很有魅力
-我没注意到

translation.en: Well, he seems to have noticed you.
translation.zh: 他看上去对你另眼相看呢

translation.en: Yeah. Well, the 7th most eligible bachelor in New York is not my kind of guy.
translation.zh:
纽约市钻石王老五
排名第七位不是我的菜

translation.en: Claudia will want to see the cargo pants both with and without the Hermes belt.
translation.zh:
克劳迪娅想看看工装裤
佩戴和不佩戴爱马仕腰带的两种效果

translation.en: How's it going? This dress doesn't need to be shorter,
translation.zh:
-怎么样？
-这件裙子不需要再短了

translation.en: it needs to taper at the knee. It's going to look boxy.
translation.zh:
应该在膝盖处收紧
否则看上去太宽松了

translation.en: And you are? This is Ella.
translation.zh:
-你是谁？
-她是艾拉

translation.en: She's helping with the photo shoot.
translation.zh: 她帮忙拍摄工作

translation.en: Less opinion, more sewing. We're on a deadline.

translation.en: Umberto's shoots can be so intense,
translation.zh: 少说意见 多缝衣服 我们时间紧迫 翁贝托的拍摄过程可能会非常紧张

translation.en: he's very unpredictable.
translation.zh: 他让人捉摸不定 德里克 嗨

translation.en: Derek, hi.
translation.zh: 德里克 嗨

translation.en: [CLEARING THROAT] Would you give me a minute?
translation.zh: 你能稍等一下吗？

translation.en: Well, you got better knees than I do.
translation.zh: 你的膝盖比我的更好用

translation.en: I busted mine playing basketball in college.
translation.zh: 你的膝盖比我的更好用 我在大学时期打篮球时摔断了腿

translation.en: Prepping for a shoot is always daunting.
translation.zh:
我在大学时期打篮球时摔断了腿 为拍摄做准备是项严峻的挑战
有很多事情需要做决定

translation.en: So many decisions to make.
translation.zh:
为拍摄做准备是项严峻的挑战
有很多事情需要做决定

translation.en: Do you think the side ruching is distorting the bodice?
translation.zh:
你觉得侧面的褶皱
使裙子的前胸变形了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, um--
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: There may be too many folds in the ruching,
translation.zh: 侧面的褶皱可能太多了

translation.en: the way it gathers at the waist.
translation.zh: 都堆叠在腰部

translation.en: What she said.
translation.zh: 她说得对

translation.en: Is this your interpreter?
translation.zh: 这是你的传译员吗？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, for the moment she is.
translation.zh: 是的 目前是的

translation.en: LIZA: Umberto says he wants approval on all the models.
translation.zh:
翁贝托说他需要所有模特
都经过审核批准

translation.en: Yes. This is a fashion magazine.
translation.zh:
翁贝托说他需要所有模特
都经过审核批准 没错 我们做的是时尚杂志

translation.en: The details are life and death. Thank you, Claudia.
translation.zh:
-细节决定成败
-谢谢你 克劳迪娅

translation.en: How can you be in charge of this place if you don't know what ruching is?
translation.zh: 你连褶裥都不知道 怎么做决策？

translation.en: Well, I just assumed it was the crumpled up
translation.zh: 你连褶裥都不知道 怎么做决策？ 我以为就是边上那些褶皱的布料

translation.en: fabric on the side there.
translation.zh: 我以为就是边上那些褶皱的布料

translation.en: It's how you crumple it that matters.
translation.zh: 如何做出褶皱才是关键

translation.en: Oh, wow. Okay. I admit I have a lot to learn.
translation.zh: 好吧 我承认我还有很多东西要学

translation.en: You think? I do.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是的

translation.en: And I don't have a lot of time to learn it.
translation.zh: 我没有太多时间来学习

translation.en: Oh, there you are. [PHONE BUZZING]
translation.zh: 你在这儿

translation.en: How was your first day at school?
translation.zh: 第一天上学感觉如何？

translation.en: I need a crash course in fashion. There is no such thing.
translation.zh:
-我需要一节时尚速成课
-没有这种课

translation.en: Well, you're a seamstress.
translation.zh: 你是个女裁缝

translation.en: I'm sure you could teach me a few of the basics.
translation.zh: 你应该可以教我一些基础知识

translation.en: I'm not just handy with a needle and thread.
translation.zh: 我可不只是一个动手做衣服的裁缝

translation.en: I'm also a designer.
translation.zh: 我还是个设计师

translation.en: That's great. Gives you more credibility. With who?
translation.zh:
-很好 这样你更有资质了
-对谁而言？

translation.en: With me.
translation.zh: 对我

translation.en: What's happening is Claudia is using my lack of knowledge
translation.zh:
目前的情况就是
克劳迪娅利用我对时尚的无知

translation.en: about fashion to undermine my authority.
translation.zh: 削弱我的权威

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I resent your authority as much as she does.
translation.zh:
对不起
但是我和克劳迪娅一样抗拒你的权威

translation.en: Are you following me? I was about to ask you the same thing.
translation.zh:
-你在跟踪我吗？
-我正要问你同样的问题

translation.en: Are you working at the magazine tomorrow?
translation.zh: 你明天来杂志社上班吗？

translation.en: I'll be there until the photo shoot's over, and then I'm gone.
translation.zh: 拍摄结束之后我才会离开

translation.en: Great. Have coffee with me in the morning.
translation.zh: 很好 早上跟我喝咖啡吧

translation.en: I want to learn fashion from someone who loves it.
translation.zh: 我想跟热爱时尚的人学习

translation.en: How do you know I love it? Because you hate the fact that I don't.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道我热爱时尚？
-因为你看不惯我不喜欢时尚

translation.en: Come on. One cup.
translation.zh: 拜托 就一杯

translation.en: Say yes.
translation.zh:
-答应我吧
-好吧

translation.en: Okay. - No, I said, "Say yes." - Yes!
translation.zh:
-说“我答应你”
-我答应你

translation.en: Perfect. This is not how I saw us ending up.
translation.zh:
-很好
-我可没想到我们会是这种结局

translation.en: So you admit there's an us.
translation.zh: 所以你承认有“我们”了

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便你

translation.en: I've never heard three syllables sound so encouraging.
translation.zh: 我从没听过这么激励人心的三个音节

translation.en: ELLA: Thanks again for coming to my loft. My homemade boutique.
translation.zh:
再次感谢你来到我的阁楼公寓
我的手工制作时装店

translation.en: So, what's the occasion again?
translation.zh: 请再告诉我你要参加什么活动？ 鲍比的父母要在他们家举办订婚宴

translation.en: Bobby's parents are having the engagement party at their house. Oh.
translation.zh: 鲍比的父母要在他们家举办订婚宴

translation.en: I'm meeting his whole family.
translation.zh: 我要见到他的所有家人

translation.en: Well, you have picked the perfect dress.
translation.zh: 你选了一条完美的裙子

translation.en: I love this color on you.
translation.zh: 我觉得这个颜色很适合你

translation.en: I never really thought of myself as the lavender type,
translation.zh: 我从来没想过我会适合穿薰衣草色

translation.en: just black, understated, trying to disappear.
translation.zh:
我更习惯暗色调
低调不惹人注目的颜色

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you.
translation.zh: 我不知道该如何感谢你

translation.en: Well, when you feel beautiful, you look beautiful. Yes?
translation.zh: 只有感觉美好才能展现美好 对吗？

translation.en: - Yes. - Yes.
translation.zh:
-对
-没错

translation.en: I'm revamping the digital magazine and I want to go live during Fashion Week.
translation.zh:
我在改造电子杂志
我想在时装周期间上线

translation.en: So, I don't have much time to get up to speed.
translation.zh: 所以留给我学习的时间不多了

translation.en: Well, this is my first time teaching Fashion 101.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次教时尚基础课

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: So, I'll begin with what I know best.
translation.zh:
-那我就从最拿手的开始教
-好的

translation.en: I always have a sketchbook with me, my sewing gigs, everywhere.
translation.zh:
不管我去哪儿
我都随身携带草图本和针线包

translation.en: You never know when inspiration will strike.
translation.zh: 你永远无法预料何时会灵感来袭

translation.en: Just to be clear, I'm not looking for an opinion
translation.zh:
先声明
我不想要别人对我的工作指手画脚

translation.en: on my work, this is strictly a learning tool.
translation.zh:
先声明
我不想要别人对我的工作指手画脚 这是严格意义上的教具

translation.en: Okay. No opinions.
translation.zh:
-好的 我没有意见
-很好

translation.en: Okay. I have a philosophy about design. I call it the IFFF Factor.
translation.zh:
我对设计有一套理论
我叫它IFFF因素

translation.en: That's spelled with one I followed by three F's.
translation.zh: 由一个I和三个F组成

translation.en: It stands for Inspiration, Fabric, Fit, and Financials.
translation.zh: 代表灵感、布料、合身和财力

translation.en: I-F-F-F. Got it.
translation.zh:
代表灵感、布料、合身和财力 -IFFF 记住了
-很好

translation.en: [LAUGHING] Okay.
translation.zh:
-IFFF 记住了
-很好

translation.en: Inspiration can come from anywhere.
translation.zh: 灵感可能源自任何地方

translation.en: A movie, a book, a color you can't get out of your head.
translation.zh:
一部电影 一本书
一种在脑中挥之不去的颜色

translation.en: This dress is all about fabric.
translation.zh: 这件裙子的精髓在于布料

translation.en: I went nuts for this brocade.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢这种锦缎

translation.en: Fit is about understanding the contours
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢这种锦缎 合身就是了解女性身体的轮廓

translation.en: of a woman's body
translation.zh: 合身就是了解女性身体的轮廓

translation.en: and helping her to embrace them.
translation.zh: 帮助她们接纳自己的身材

translation.en: I know I'm not supposed to do this,
translation.zh: 我知道我不该说

translation.en: but these, these are really good.
translation.zh: 但是这些真的很厉害 你只学到了皮毛 还不够下结论

translation.en: Well, you don't know enough to know they're good,
translation.zh: 你只学到了皮毛 还不够下结论

translation.en: but, um, thank you.
translation.zh: 不过谢谢你

translation.en: Financials is making sure the woman can afford it.
translation.zh: 财力是确保女性能买得起

translation.en: I don't want the price tag to overwhelm the joy they get
translation.zh: 我不希望价格标签 盖过了她们穿裙子带来的喜悦感

translation.en: from wearing the dress.
translation.zh: 盖过了她们穿裙子带来的喜悦感

translation.en: That, that might be the most important thing you said.
translation.zh:
那个…那个可能是
你说过的最重要的一点

translation.en: See, I'm trying to make the publications more accessible,
translation.zh:
你知道我在想办法
让出版物更能让大众所接受

translation.en: but my father is resistant to change,
translation.zh: 但是我的父亲不愿意改革

translation.en: and his father founded the company,
translation.zh:
但是我的父亲不愿意改革 他的父亲创办了公司
他也是同样的行事风格

translation.en: and he's the exact same way.
translation.zh:
他的父亲创办了公司
他也是同样的行事风格

translation.en: So, the Prince of Publishing hashtag is for real.
translation.zh: 所以你的出版业王子的头衔是真的？

translation.en: Inheriting a publishing dynasty is not such a terrible fate.
translation.zh: 继承一个出版帝国也不算命不好吧

translation.en: You're very hard to read.
translation.zh: 你让人难以捉摸

translation.en: What are you thinking?
translation.zh: 你在想什么？

translation.en: That our backgrounds are nothing alike.
translation.zh: 我们的背景截然不同

translation.en: I grew up in Pittsburgh.
translation.zh: 我在匹兹堡长大

translation.en: My dad worked in a textile mill. [CHUCKLES]
translation.zh: 我的爸爸在一家纺织厂工作

translation.en: He'd bring home all these end-pieces and I would sew them together.
translation.zh:
他会把边角料带回家
我就把它们缝在一起

translation.en: He must be so proud that you became a designer.
translation.zh: 你成为设计师 他一定很骄傲

translation.en: He passed away when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我还小的时候他就去世了

translation.en: Ah, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: That's okay, my mom is proud enough for two.
translation.zh: 没关系 我的妈妈也非常的骄傲

translation.en: Ooh. I'm late for Oscar.
translation.zh: 我跟奥斯卡的约会迟到了

translation.en: - Who's Oscar? - The man I can't live without.
translation.zh:
-谁是奥斯卡？
-一个我离不开的男人

translation.en: ELLA: So, this is where the magic happens.
translation.zh: 这里就是创造奇迹的地方

translation.en: It is. Whenever I parachute in to save one of our publications,
translation.zh: 没错 每当我需要拯救一个刊物时

translation.en: I always take Oscar with me to run the digital side.
translation.zh: 我总是让奥斯卡负责电子版面

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-你好

translation.en: Ella here is going to make me fashion-savvy.
translation.zh: 艾拉会帮助我领悟时尚

translation.en: Savvy might be overreaching.
translation.zh: 领悟这个词有点夸张

translation.en: [CHUCKLES] Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Look. What we're doing here can't be an online replica of the print version.
translation.zh:
听着 我们所做的
不是简单地把印刷版搬到网上

translation.en: We want to produce new, fresh, more relevant content.
translation.zh:
我们想要出版新鲜、有新意的
更能让人产生共鸣的内容

translation.en: That might get us more traffic ad-buys,
translation.zh: 有可能帮我们引流 提高广告购买率

translation.en: which are running really low.
translation.zh:
-目前的数据很悲观
-对

translation.en: Right. Most women can barely afford the magazine,
translation.zh: 大多数女性买不起杂志

translation.en: let alone the clothes they see inside.
translation.zh: 更别提里面展示的衣服了

translation.en: That's kind of my thing,
translation.zh:
更别提里面展示的衣服了 这就是我擅长的事了
把时尚带给普通大众

translation.en: bringing fashion to the masses.
translation.zh:
这就是我擅长的事了
把时尚带给普通大众

translation.en: Yeah, I'm getting that.
translation.zh: 是的 我开始理解了

translation.en: Fashion has been ignoring the women who aren't models,
translation.zh:
时尚一直以来
都在忽视普通女性 她们并不是模特

translation.en: and there are a lot more of us than there are size twos.
translation.zh: 大多数的女性都不是二号身材

translation.en: You have a chance to change that, and double your readership while you're at it.
translation.zh:
你有机会改变现状
同时使你的读者数量翻倍

translation.en: Well, I think you got a point.
translation.zh: 我觉得你说的有道理

translation.en: Let me think about it.
translation.zh: 让我好好想想

translation.en: Hello again.
translation.zh: 又见面了

translation.en: Hey, Oscar.
translation.zh: 你好 奥斯卡

translation.en: Katie gave me a tour of The Closet and all the hottest designers.
translation.zh:
凯蒂带我参观了衣橱
还有所有当红设计师的作品

translation.en: Lucky you.
translation.zh: 你真走运

translation.en: We are setting up for the photo shoot
translation.zh: 我们在准备拍摄工作

translation.en: and the stylist needs to make some alterations.
translation.zh: 造型师需要做一点修改

translation.en: Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Umberto is the best photographer in the business
translation.zh: 翁贝托是业界最优秀的摄影师

translation.en: and an editorial shoot is a great way to learn about fashion.
translation.zh: 采编拍摄是学习时尚的绝佳机会

translation.en: You should be there. Well, okay.
translation.zh:
-你应该一起来
-好的

translation.en: OSCAR: I can't tell if she's the boss or the assistant.
translation.zh: 我看不出来她是老板还是助理

translation.en: Yeah, me either.
translation.zh: 我也看不出来

translation.en: Give me more eyes.
translation.zh: 多看镜头

translation.en: That's it. I love this shot.
translation.zh: 就这样 很漂亮

translation.en: Yes! Can we get more light on Jasmine please?
translation.zh: 能给贾丝明补点光吗？

translation.en: A puff sleeve is hard to pull off, but I think it's perfection.
translation.zh:
泡泡袖很难驾驭
但是我觉得这件衣服设计得很完美

translation.en: Who is that person?
translation.zh: 那个人是谁？

translation.en: Some sewer who latched onto Derek.
translation.zh: 某个缠着德里克的裁缝

translation.en: Umberto thinks I'm a little shiny.
translation.zh: 翁贝托觉得我的妆有点油光

translation.en: You need to sign off on Manolo's Long Live Stilettos spread.
translation.zh:
需要您批准莫罗的
“高跟鞋万岁”的版面设计

translation.en: Alright. Keep an eye on Derek while I'm gone.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不在的时候盯着点德里克

translation.en: I don't want him having opinions and ruining the shoot.
translation.zh: 我不希望他乱发表意见 打乱拍摄

translation.en: Derek. We met at a party in the Hamptons last summer.
translation.zh:

德里克让某个

不客气 -这位是麦克斯林特尔斯

-这位是麦克斯林特尔斯

在各个零售商之间推来推去的人

translation.en: from jobber to jobber on 7th Avenue.

在第七大道上负责把挂衣架
在各个零售商之间推来推去的人 我的母亲在制衣厂打工

translation.en: [LAUGHING] Right.

translation.en: you're okay with me.

它不仅决定了造型

-我们管它叫布料的手

translation.en: - Okay. - Go ahead and give it a try it.

那个销售员就像是

translation.zh: 或者艳压舞池之类的

translation.en: Get some glass slippers to go with the dress.
translation.zh: 穿一双水晶鞋来搭配这件裙子

translation.en: Mm! Yeah! Yes.
translation.zh: 没错 对

translation.en: I want to coordinate the photos of the loft
translation.zh: 你要将阁楼的照片

translation.en: and the Lower East Side neighborhood with your article.
translation.zh: 和下东区的故事融合在文章里

translation.en: What pictures, what article?
translation.zh: 什么照片？ 什么文章？

translation.en: I'm writing a piece about Ella for the digital magazine.
translation.zh: 我在为电子杂志写艾拉的专访

translation.en: On whose authority?
translation.zh: 是谁授权的？

translation.en: On Derek's authority, and on mine.
translation.zh: 德里克和我的授权

translation.en: And what is it about Ella that the readers are dying to know?
translation.zh: 艾拉有什么故事值得读者翘首期待？

translation.en: That she is designing beautiful clothes the fit the full-figured women that The Look has been ignoring
translation.zh:
她为被《外表》杂志
忽略了半个世纪的大码模特

translation.en: for 50 years.
translation.zh: 制作合身的衣服

translation.en: Well said.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: I doubt very much that Claudia would agree.
translation.zh: 克劳迪娅肯定不会同意的

translation.en: Jasmine would be an absolute vision in that outfit
translation.zh: 贾丝明如果戴着我选中的项链

translation.en: if she were wearing the necklace I selected.
translation.zh: 肯定会更加光彩照人

translation.en: If I could have a quick word? It's important.
translation.zh: 我能说句话吗？非常重要

translation.en: Nothing is more important than The Book.
translation.zh: 没什么比《外表》更重要

translation.en: It's about the future of the magazine and the direction it's taking.
translation.zh: 事关杂志的未来和走向

translation.en: Unfurrow your brow and cut to the chase.
translation.zh: 别皱眉头了 说重点

translation.en: I'm talking about Derek's plans for the digital magazine.
translation.zh: 我指的是德里克关于电子杂志的计划

translation.en: It's a big departure from the usual content,
translation.zh: 这是一项巨大的尝试

translation.en: and by "big" I mean wider.
translation.zh: “巨大”指的是更宽大 “更宽大”指的是大码

translation.en: And by "wider" I mean full-figured.
translation.zh: “更宽大”指的是大码

translation.en: He's doing a story about Ella.
translation.zh: 他要写一篇关于艾拉的文章

translation.en: That nobody from the fashion shoot?
translation.zh: 拍摄现场那个无名小卒？

translation.en: I don't know what she's telling him, but Derek seems to be listening.
translation.zh:
我不知道她跟德里克说了什么
但是他好像听她的

translation.en: Well, then his father better start listening to me.
translation.zh: 既然如此 他的父亲最好得听我的

translation.en: My name is synonymous with this brand and I will not be ignored.
translation.zh:
我的名字就等同于这个杂志品牌
他们不能无视我

translation.en: Great. Claudia called my father to complain,
translation.zh: 很好 克劳迪娅给我父亲打电话抱怨

translation.en: and now we have a meeting to discuss
translation.zh: 现在我们要开会讨论给大码模特

translation.en: the questionable decision to give plus-size so much space.
translation.zh: 现在我们要开会讨论给大码模特 太多展示空间的这一有争议的决定

translation.en: And how much space does she think the majority of American women deserve?
translation.zh:
她觉得大部分的美国女性
值得多少展示空间？

translation.en: We could hold the editorial on
translation.zh:
我们可以花几个月时间
讨论身体自爱的话题

translation.en: body positivity for a few months.
translation.zh:
我们可以花几个月时间
讨论身体自爱的话题 身体自爱不只是流行语

translation.en: Body positivity isn't just some trendy phrase.
translation.zh: 身体自爱不只是流行语

translation.en: It's changing lives.
translation.zh: 它可以改变人生

translation.en: Knowing that you're valued for who you are,
translation.zh:
让人明白不论你是谁
什么尺码和身材

translation.en: any size, any shape.
translation.zh: 你都有价值

translation.en: Don't let anyone take that away.
translation.zh: 别让任何人剥夺这种理想

translation.en: In order to increase revenue, we have to appeal to a broader base.
translation.zh:
为了提高收入
我们必须拓展我们的读者群体

translation.en: Well, they're certainly broader, I'll grant you that.
translation.zh: 她们肯定更大 我可以肯定这一点

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: But not the type to buy The Look.
translation.zh: 但是不是《外表》的受众群

translation.en: Perhaps if The Look weren't so condescendingly
translation.zh:
如果《外表》的内容
不是如此居高临下的狭隘

translation.en: narrow in scope they would.
translation.zh:
如果《外表》的内容
不是如此居高临下的狭隘 她们也许会感兴趣

translation.en: Who is putting all this nonsense in your head?
translation.zh: 是谁给你灌输了这种无稽之谈？

translation.en: I am vehemently opposed to some
translation.zh:
是谁给你灌输了这种无稽之谈？ 我强烈反对那些
时尚属于每个女人的理念

translation.en: everywoman idea of fashion.
translation.zh:
我强烈反对那些
时尚属于每个女人的理念

translation.en: It should be aspirational.
translation.zh: 时尚应该是鼓舞人心的

translation.en: Beautiful women we all want to be, wearing beautiful clothing!
translation.zh:
我们都梦想成为的
身着华服的美丽女人

translation.en: And isn't that how every woman wants to feel?
translation.zh: 这不是所有女性的共同感受吗？

translation.en: I mean, I'm not setting limitations on who's allowed
translation.zh: 我不想限制哪些读者有权利

translation.en: to dream when they read our magazine.
translation.zh: 我不想限制哪些读者有权利 怀揣梦想

translation.en: I'm sorry, Claudia, but I'm not changing my mind.
translation.zh: 对不起 但是我不会改变主意的

translation.en: Does he still speak for you?
translation.zh: 他还是代表你吗？

translation.en: Assuming he turns out to be right.
translation.zh: 如果他的想法是对的 那就是

translation.en: Well, we stick with what we got.
translation.zh: 我们坚持既有方案

translation.en: On behalf of a whole lot of women, thank you.
translation.zh: 我代表大多数女人感谢你

translation.en: Father, you remember Ella.
translation.zh: 父亲 你记得艾拉吧

translation.en: Hello, again.
translation.zh: 你好 又见面了

translation.en: This is how you make critical business decisions?
translation.zh: 你就是这样做出重大商业决策的吗？

translation.en: On the advice of a momentary fling?
translation.zh: 基于一时的放纵？

translation.en: It isn't momentary and it's not a fling.
translation.zh: 这不是一时的 也不是什么放纵

translation.en: We're working together.
translation.zh: 我们是工作伙伴

translation.en: Very closely, it appears.
translation.zh: 显然是很亲密的伙伴

translation.en: Filling my shoes isn't automatic, it has to be earned.
translation.zh:
谁也不能自动接替我的位置
你必须要证明自己

translation.en: Well, if this is going to work, I have be able to do things my own way.
translation.zh:
如果要接替你的位置
我必须按照自己的方式

translation.en: Not if it means risking the company that defines our family name.
translation.zh:
如果要以定义家族名誉的公司
做赌注 那坚决不行

translation.en: Mr. Colby?
translation.zh: 科尔比先生？

translation.en: I may be overstepping,
translation.zh: 我可能没资格这么说

translation.en: but I think your son is trying
translation.zh:
但是我觉得 您的儿子想利用
您给的机会做有意义的事

translation.en: to do some good with the opportunity you gave him.
translation.zh:
您的儿子想利用
您给的机会做有意义的事

translation.en: He has some pretty great ideas of what the future could look like.
translation.zh: 他对未来世界的趋势有独到的想法

translation.en: Give him the chance to make you proud.
translation.zh: 请给他一个会让您引以为豪的机会吧

translation.en: Are you always this bold?
translation.zh: 你总是这么大胆吗？

translation.en: Only when I know I'm right.
translation.zh: 只有当我知道我言之有理的时候

translation.en: He needs you to believe in him.
translation.zh: 他需要您相信他

translation.en: Point well-taken. And well-delivered.
translation.zh: 我接纳了你的建议 你的说辞很有说服力

translation.en: Not too shabby, as penthouses go.
translation.zh: 环境不错 对于顶层公寓来说

translation.en: But he's moving to Brooklyn, so he's forgiven.
translation.zh:
他要搬到布鲁克林了
所以可以原谅他

translation.en: Yes, I am making my daring escape from the Upper East Side.
translation.zh: 没错 我要勇敢地逃离上东区了

translation.en: It's about time.
translation.zh: 也是时候了

translation.en: So, the secret to a good Bolognese sauce is the pancetta.
translation.zh:
好吃的肉酱意大利面
秘诀是意大利烟肉

translation.en: The more pancetta the merrier, I always say.
translation.zh:
好吃的肉酱意大利面
秘诀是意大利烟肉 越多烟肉越好吃 我常常这样说

translation.en: - Oh, yeah? - Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 哦 是吗？

translation.en: - You always say that? - Yup.
translation.zh:
-你常常这么说？
-是的

translation.en: Who do you say it to?
translation.zh: 你对谁这样说？

translation.en: Mostly to myself, it doesn't really come up a lot.
translation.zh: 多数时候自言自语 我不经常做饭

translation.en: So, I gather you like to cook.
translation.zh: 看得出你喜欢做饭 对 算是我的爱好吧

translation.en: Yeah, you know, it's kind of a hobby of mine.
translation.zh: 对 算是我的爱好吧

translation.en: Pretty sure you learned that at your last publication.
translation.zh: 你肯定是从上次的出版物里学到的

translation.en: Okay, Oscar, that's enough out of you.
translation.zh: 奥斯卡 你说够了吧

translation.en: Now, for the real test.
translation.zh: 现在要实测了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: More wine?
translation.zh: 再加点红酒吗？

translation.en: I think you should leave sensational alone.
translation.zh: 我觉得恰到好处

translation.en: I like working here, better food, better view.
translation.zh: 我喜欢在这里工作 食物更美味 景色更好

translation.en: Away from Claudia and her spies.
translation.zh: 能远离克劳迪娅和她的间谍们

translation.en: Yeah, well, we go live in nine days,
translation.zh: 没错 再过九天就要上线了

translation.en: so Claudia's views will be a moot point.
translation.zh:
所以克劳迪娅的观点
很快就无关紧要了

translation.en: I'm sure she'll find a way to un-moot her point.
translation.zh: 她肯定有办法让你在意她的观点

translation.en: So, you play that piano?
translation.zh: 你弹钢琴吗？ 对

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. A little bit.
translation.zh: 一点点

translation.en: I'm gonna head home.
translation.zh: 我要回家了

translation.en: I will see you two tomorrow. Alright, have a good night.
translation.zh:
-明天见
-晚安

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: Alright, Colby. Let's see what you got.
translation.zh: 好了 科尔比 让我开开眼吧

translation.en: Alright, but I'm not looking for an opinion.
translation.zh: 好吧 但是我不想听到你的意见

translation.en: Any requests?
translation.zh: 要点歌吗？

translation.en: Your piano, your call.
translation.zh: 你的钢琴你说了算

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Is there anything you can't do?
translation.zh: 你有什么不会的吗？

translation.en: I can't sew.
translation.zh: 我不会缝纫

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I can't skate.
translation.zh: 我不会滑冰

translation.en: Yeah, that makes the two of us.
translation.zh: 我和你一样

translation.en: I can't walk in heels.
translation.zh: 我不会穿高跟鞋走路

translation.en: I thought we agreed you'd be less wonderful.
translation.zh: 我记得你答应过你要变得不那么完美

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: It's only a dress. No lives are at stake.
translation.zh: 只不过是条裙子 又不是人命关天

translation.en: Do you know how many silkworms on how many mulberry leaves it took to make this fabric?
translation.zh:
你知道这块布
需要多少蚕宝宝吐的丝才能做成吗？

translation.en: Ugh, TMI.
translation.zh: 不想知道那么多信息

translation.en: I prefer to think that silk just happens,
translation.zh: 我倾向于以为丝绸是从天而降的

translation.en: no creepy crawly critters are involved.
translation.zh: 不要牵扯那些恶心的小爬虫

translation.en: Liza is coming in late today.
translation.zh: 莱莎今天会迟到

translation.en: She is so obsessed with this party.
translation.zh: 她对这场派对近乎狂热

translation.en: I bet she's having something done before the big event.
translation.zh: 我打赌派对前她会有大动作

translation.en: Like what?
translation.zh: 我打赌派对前她会有大动作 比如什么？

translation.en: [speaking in a British accent] The red-carpet special, Ella.
translation.zh: 红毯特别版 艾拉

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Have you seen Katie?
translation.zh: 你见到凯蒂了吗？

translation.en: No. She's somewhere around here.
translation.zh: 没有 她就在附近

translation.en: What are you looking at?
translation.zh: 你在看什么？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: I have a staff meeting.
translation.zh: 我要跟员工开会

translation.en: I had a lunch-time touch-up.
translation.zh: 我在午休时间补了个妆

translation.en: Are you judging me?
translation.zh: 你在评判我吗？

translation.en: I'm not judging, I'm nodding.
translation.zh: 我没有 我只是在点头

translation.en: It's not easy being surrounded by all these models.
translation.zh: 跟这些模特在一起很不容易

translation.en: Always feeling like the before instead of the after.
translation.zh:
总是觉得别人在对自己指指点点
而不是点头致意

translation.en: A little filler helps.
translation.zh: 给胸部加点填充会有帮助

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我懂

translation.en: No, you don't.
translation.zh: 不 你不懂

translation.en: Trust me, I do.
translation.zh: 相信我 我懂

translation.en: KATIE: The article is almost done,
translation.zh: 文章快写完了

translation.en: but it's hard to capture Ella in 500 words.
translation.zh: 但是五百字不足以展现艾拉的魅力

translation.en: Well, how about smart, funny, talented, to name a few.
translation.zh:
试试“风趣”“聪明”“才华”
我只举几个例子？

translation.en: I couldn't agree more.
translation.zh: 我完全认同

translation.en: You've gotta keep the immigrant garment workers who lived
translation.zh:
你得保留那些曾经
住在大楼里的移民纺织工人的图片

translation.en: in the building, it gives the story gravitas.
translation.zh: 这增加了文章的厚重感

translation.en: Gravitas coming right up.
translation.zh: 马上给你厚重感

translation.en: You want to get a bite to eat?
translation.zh: 你想吃东西吗？

translation.en: I have to get back to The Closet.
translation.zh: 我得赶回衣橱

translation.en: Liza wants me to pull some dresses for her to wear to the party.
translation.zh: 莱莎要我给她找参加派对的衣服

translation.en: And what are you going to wear?
translation.zh: 莱莎要我给她找参加派对的衣服 你会穿什么？

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh:
-去哪儿？
-去派对

translation.en: You could be my plus one.
translation.zh: 你可以陪我去

translation.en: Oh, I guess I'm going to a party.
translation.zh: 我猜我要去参加派对了

translation.en: Just bring some advertisers with you, please.
translation.zh: 别忘了邀请广告商

translation.en: It's not that bad.
translation.zh: 没那么糟 有的

translation.en: Oh, it is. People still see us as a sidecar to the print magazine.
translation.zh:
在大众眼里
我们依然是印刷杂志的副产品

translation.en: We need this party to generate some major buzz before we publish, okay?
translation.zh:
在上线之前 我们需要这次派对
来获取大家的关注 懂吗？

translation.en: Is Claudia on her broomstick again?
translation.zh: 克劳迪娅又在搞什么名堂了吗？ 不 目前她还没有动作

translation.en: No, it's currently parked.
translation.zh: 不 目前她还没有动作

translation.en: Just the usual woes of trying to turn a profit.
translation.zh: 不 目前她还没有动作 只是为了盈利而产生的日常烦恼

translation.en: Wanna go get lunch? I'm buying.
translation.zh: 只是为了盈利而产生的日常烦恼 想去吃午饭吗？我请客

translation.en: Oh, I would love to,
translation.zh: 哦 我很想去

translation.en: it's just I have a meeting with an ad agency.
translation.zh: 不过我要去见一个广告代理

translation.en: Oh, well, in that case, go get 'em.
translation.zh: 好吧 这样的话 加油吧

translation.en: Another time?
translation.zh: 好吧 这样的话 加油吧 改天？

translation.en: Any other time?
translation.zh: 另找时间？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh:
-没问题
-好的

translation.en: Sometimes I feel like he's too good to be true.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得他美好得不真实

translation.en: What's a girl supposed to do when subjected to all that charm?
translation.zh: 面对他的魅力 女孩该如何招架？

translation.en: I think he's into you, and you're obviously into him.
translation.zh: 我觉得他喜欢你 很明显你也喜欢他

translation.en: I was hoping it wasn't that obvious.
translation.zh: 我觉得他喜欢你 很明显你也喜欢他 我原想不要表现得那么明显

translation.en: You've had serious boyfriends before, why is this throwing you for such a loop?
translation.zh:
你以前也交往过男朋友
为什么这一次这么犹豫不决？

translation.en: Peter was great on paper, but he never made me laugh.
translation.zh: 皮特的文笔很棒 但是他不够风趣

translation.en: and Jason and I almost got married,
translation.zh: 杰森和我差点就结婚了

translation.en: but, you know, deep down, I knew he wasn't the one.
translation.zh: 但是内心深处我知道他不适合我

translation.en: I don't know, they were both reasonable choices,
translation.zh: 我说不好 他们都是合理的选择

translation.en: the 7th most eligible bachelor in New York, not so much.
translation.zh: 纽约的钻石王老五第七名 恐怕不是

translation.en: Try not to run away before you find out.
translation.zh: 在你充分了解他之前别着急逃跑

translation.en: I hate that you know me so well.
translation.zh: 在你充分了解他之前别着急逃跑 我很讨厌你这么了解我

translation.en: I have to go to bed, I have such an early morning tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我得去睡觉了 明天还得早起 就快完工了

translation.en: Almost finished.
translation.zh: 就快完工了

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: It is even more magical than the sketch.
translation.zh: 比草稿还要惊艳

translation.en: It's very Cinderella.
translation.zh: 非常像灰姑娘的风格

translation.en: I used to love Cinderella when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我小的时候最爱灰姑娘了

translation.en: I read all the storybooks, saw all the movies,
translation.zh: 我看过所有的书 看过所有电影

translation.en: but Cinderella never looked like me.
translation.zh: 但是灰姑娘从来不是我这个样子

translation.en: There are a lot of little girls feeling what I felt.
translation.zh: 有很多小姑娘和我的感受一样

translation.en: I kind of want to change that.
translation.zh: 我很想改变这一点

translation.en: Yet another pearl of wisdom that I have to now jam into this article.
translation.zh: 又有一句至理名言要写进文章里了

translation.en: - Goodnight. - Goodnight.
translation.zh:
-晚安
-晚安

translation.en: Alright, what do you got?
translation.zh: 好了 这样好看吗？

translation.en: No. No. Doesn't work.
translation.zh: 不 不好看

translation.en: Another RSVP.
translation.zh: 又有一个参加派对的确认函了

translation.en: I am not happy about this party.
translation.zh: 我不期待这场派对

translation.en: Derek is trying to stand in my spotlight.
translation.zh: 德里克想要抢我的风头

translation.en: The guest list needs to include all of the designers
translation.zh: 客人名单必须包括 所有对我忠诚的设计师和贵宾

translation.en: and VIPs that are loyal to me.
translation.zh: 所有对我忠诚的设计师和贵宾

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh:
当然了 还要邀请贾丝明
和其他参与拍摄的模特

translation.en: And invite Jasmine and some of the models from the print issue,
translation.zh:
还要邀请贾丝明
和其他参与拍摄的模特

translation.en: they know how to steal the focus.

translation.zh:
-拜托
-感谢大家 你们都很认同

translation.en: because we just sold all of our advertising space
translation.zh: 因为我们的电子杂志初刊的

translation.en: for the first issue of the digital magazine.
translation.zh: 广告版面刚刚全部售罄

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Now, the idea of inclusivity extending to fashion,
translation.zh: 时尚的包容性 对我来说是全新的理念

translation.en: it was new to me, but I had a great teacher.
translation.zh: 对我来说是全新的理念 但是我有一个好老师

translation.en: An up-and-coming designer and someone who cares deeply
translation.zh: 一颗冉冉升起的设计新星 她深切关心这些话题

translation.en: about these issues.
translation.zh: 她深切关心这些话题

translation.en: If I might, I'd like to introduce to you Ella Richards.
translation.zh: 请允许我介绍艾拉理查兹

translation.en: Ella?
translation.zh: 艾拉？

translation.en: We are grateful for Derek's contribution to our digital counterpart.
translation.zh:
我们要感谢
德里克为电子版做出的贡献

translation.en: Mm-hm.
translation.zh:
我们要感谢
德里克为电子版做出的贡献 但是别忘了
印刷杂志将继续定义时尚

translation.en: But let's not forget the print magazine, which continues to define fashion.
translation.zh:
但是别忘了
印刷杂志将继续定义时尚

translation.en: Ella.
translation.zh: 艾拉

translation.en: Sewing helps me clear my mind...
translation.zh: 缝纫能帮我理清思路

translation.en: ...and my heart.
translation.zh: 还有我的心

translation.en: I don't think it's working this time.
translation.zh: 我觉得这一次好像不管用

translation.en: Derek texted me. Said he's been trying to reach you.
translation.zh:
德里克给我发短信
他说他一直在找你

translation.en: I'm not interested in being some plus-sized Cinderella
translation.zh: 我没有兴趣给帅气的王子

translation.en: to his Prince Charming.
translation.zh: 当什么大码灰姑娘

translation.en: Wear something really nice today, okay?
translation.zh: 今天穿漂亮点 好吗？

translation.en: I think I'm going to stay home.
translation.zh: 我想我会待在家里

translation.en: Annie Chew will be there, she's doing an editorial shoot.
translation.zh: 周安妮也会去 她要拍采编照

translation.en: It would be really hard to walk into that place.
translation.zh: 我现在没有勇气走进那个地方

translation.en: We publish in a few days
translation.zh: 再过几天就要发布了

translation.en: and this article could really put you on the map.
translation.zh: 这篇文章有可能让你名声大噪

translation.en: Forget about the guy with the million-dollar smile,
translation.zh: 别再想那个笑容迷人的男人了

translation.en: keep your eyes on the prize.
translation.zh: 关注自己真正想要的东西

translation.en: Alight. All systems go. Ella will be here any minute.
translation.zh:
-好了 一切准备就绪
-艾拉很快就到

translation.en: It's a lot of moving parts in this, so everything needs to move like clockwork.
translation.zh: 有很多细枝末节 一切都不能出差错

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Uh, hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: Right before we publish, things get a little nuts.
translation.zh: 正式发布之前 难免会手忙脚乱

translation.en: You know, you guys go ahead, we'll go finish up.
translation.zh: 你们继续吧 我们去做收尾工作

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.zh: 没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Just some last minute details I need to take care of.
translation.zh: 只是一些最后的细节需要处理

translation.en: Maybe I should wait outside.
translation.zh: 或许我该在外面等你

translation.en: Maybe-- Maybe you should tell me what's wrong.
translation.zh: 或许… 或许你能告诉我出什么事了

translation.en: Ella.
translation.zh: 艾拉

translation.en: Talk to me.
translation.zh: 告诉我 我们能不能只谈工作？

translation.en: Can we just keep this about work and leave it at that?
translation.zh: 我们能不能只谈工作？ 不能

translation.en: No. No, we can't.
translation.zh: 不 不能

translation.en: I was really upset when you left.
translation.zh: 你的离开让我很失望

translation.en: I made this big speech
translation.zh: 你的离开让我很失望 我为你准备了演讲 还介绍了你…

translation.en: and introduced you, and...
translation.zh: 我为你准备了演讲 还介绍了你…

translation.en: The woman who inspired it all she--
translation.zh: 这一切灵感的源泉 她…

translation.en: she wasn't there.
translation.zh: 她却离开了

translation.en: I felt like you were using me
translation.zh: 我觉得你是在利用我

translation.en: to make some kind of statement and sell more ads.
translation.zh: 造势 好卖出广告位

translation.en: Ella, I thought you knew me better than that.
translation.zh: 艾拉 我还以为你很了解我

translation.en: You know how you always talk about my honesty?
translation.zh: 你知道你总是说我很坦诚？

translation.en: Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 你知道你总是说我很坦诚？ 或许我对自己不够坦诚

translation.en: Well, maybe I haven't been honest with myself.
translation.zh: 或许我对自己不够坦诚

translation.en: I do know you,
translation.zh: 我确实了解你

translation.en: and I know how much I care for you.
translation.zh: 我也知道我很在乎你

translation.en: I think that's what I'm running from.
translation.zh: 我想我是在逃避这一点

translation.en: Let's get real, I'm not exactly your type. What do you think my type is?
translation.zh:
-别装了 我不是你的类型…
-你觉得我的类型是什么？

translation.en: You have cover girls like Jasmine--
translation.zh: 像贾丝明那样的封面女郎

translation.en: Jasmine doesn't even-- What exactly do I mean to you?!
translation.zh:
-贾丝明甚至不…
-我对你意味着什么？

translation.en: Ella. You, Ella.
translation.zh: 你 艾拉…

translation.en: You mean everything to me.
translation.zh: 你就是我的一切

translation.en: Which is why I need you to come with me.
translation.zh: 所以… 我要你跟我来

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧 来吧

translation.en: Where are we going? You'll see.
translation.zh:
-我们去哪儿？
-待会儿就知道了

translation.en: Father. What are you doing here?
translation.zh:
父亲 -你在这儿干什么？
-我想和你共进午餐

translation.en: I was hoping we could have lunch.
translation.zh:
-你在这儿干什么？
-我想和你共进午餐

translation.en: Hello, Ella, it's very nice to see you again.
translation.zh: 你好 艾拉 很高兴又见到你

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你好 艾拉 很高兴又见到你 我也是

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's very busy, there's a lot going on today.
translation.zh: 对不起 我太忙了 今天的事情太多了

translation.en: It's not a good time.
translation.zh: 时间不合适

translation.en: Oh, alright.
translation.zh: 哦 好吧

translation.en: Well, this will just take a moment,
translation.zh: 我不会耽误你太久的 不过我觉得这很重要

translation.en: but I think it's important.
translation.zh: 不过我觉得这很重要

translation.en: I just came from a board meeting where I found myself
translation.zh: 我刚刚结束了董事会 我在会上说

translation.en: saying that the future of the company...
translation.zh: 我刚刚结束了董事会 我在会上说 公司未来的掌舵人…

translation.en: ...is in good hands.
translation.zh: 能担重任

translation.en: The hands of my very capable son.
translation.zh: 我的儿子不负众望

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 爸爸

translation.en: - Derek? - Yeah?
translation.zh:
德里克？ -什么事？
-我们现在要去工作室

translation.en: We need to get to the studio!
translation.zh:
-什么事？
-我们现在要去工作室

translation.en: Right, I'll, uh-- I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 好的 马上到

translation.en: Is it always this busy around here?
translation.zh: 这里总是这么忙碌吗？

translation.en: Busy? Yes. Happy? No.
translation.zh: 忙碌？是的 开心？非也

translation.en: That's new.
translation.zh: 这是新状况

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: [sighing] Fashion.
translation.zh: 时尚

translation.en: I just wanted to say hello.
translation.zh: 我想过来打个招呼

translation.en: Hello, Ella.
translation.zh: 你好 艾拉

translation.en: Max, I didn't know you'd be here. Where else would I be on such a big day?
translation.zh:
-麦克斯 我没想到你也在
-这种大日子 我还能去哪？

translation.en: Annie gave me some great quotes that you might want to hear.
translation.zh:
安妮写了几句精彩的引文
我想你肯定想听听

translation.en: I think you're very talented, Ella,
translation.zh: 我觉得你很有才华 艾拉

translation.en: and I think you care about your customer. I do.
translation.zh:
-而且我觉得你很关心你的客人
-没错

translation.en: I want to expand my company.
translation.zh: 我想要扩大公司规模

translation.en: I have been looking for a designer that can do full-figured women justice.
translation.zh:
我一直在寻找
能为大码女性发声的设计师

translation.en: I think that's you.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是不二人选

translation.en: I would like to be in business with you. I don't know what to say.
translation.zh:
-我想和你合作
-我都不知道说什么了

translation.en: I would go with yes.
translation.zh:
-你可以说“好的”
-好的

translation.en: Yes, yes. The biggest, loudest yes ever!
translation.zh:
-你可以说“好的”
-好的 有史以来最大声的“好的”

translation.en: Well, then let's get the word out about Ella Originals.
translation.zh: 让我们来宣传艾拉原创吧

translation.en: Oh, Bert is doing your photo shoot.
translation.zh: 哦 伯特是你的摄影师

translation.en: No, Ella, he is doing your shoot.
translation.zh: 不 艾拉 他是你的摄影师

translation.en: Derek gave me an offer I couldn't refuse.
translation.zh: 德里克开出的条件我无法拒绝

translation.en: He said he would let me shoot my favorite model.
translation.zh: 他答应我 用我最爱的模特

translation.en: Candice Huffine. Wearing my dress.
translation.zh: 坎迪斯赫芬穿着我的裙子

translation.en: Hi, Ella. Congratulations. I'm so excited for you.
translation.zh: 你好 艾拉 祝贺你 我看好你

translation.en: Thank you. [LAUGHING]
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You are a hero of mine.
translation.zh: 你是我的英雄

translation.en: I mean, your confidence is as stunning as your beauty.
translation.zh: 你的自信和你的美貌一样动人

translation.en: Thank you for helping me find mine.
translation.zh: 谢谢你帮我找到了我的自信

translation.en: Thank you. It is such an honor to be here.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢你 能来这儿是我的荣幸

translation.en: And I know that we're going to be great friends.
translation.zh: 我知道我们会成为好朋友的

translation.en: And I say we take some photos of this gorgeous creation.
translation.zh: 我知道我们会成为好朋友的 我们快给这件华丽的作品拍照吧

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Far be it from me to stand in the way of what sells.
translation.zh: 只要有市场 我才不会横加阻拦

translation.en: You did all of this for me?
translation.zh: 你做这一切都是为了我吗？

translation.en: Mm-hm. I believe in you, Ella.
translation.zh: 我相信你 艾拉

translation.en: I'm the lead story of The Look.
translation.zh: 我是《外表》的头版头条

translation.en: Yeah, you are.
translation.zh: 没错 你是

translation.en: And I ended up with the Prince.
translation.zh: 我的结局是和王子在一起

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Our story has just begun.
translation.zh: 我们的故事才刚刚开始

translation.en: You go show 'em who's boss.
translation.zh: 让他们看看谁才是老板

translation.en: Ella, join us!
translation.zh: 艾拉 一起来吧

translation.en: You go, Ella.
translation.zh: 加油 艾拉
